title: Xi stresses power of core socialist values, traditional culture
content:
A meeting commending role models in the country's fight against the COVID-19 epidemic is held at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, capital of China, Sept. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Zhang Ling)
BEIJING, Sept. 8 (Xinhua) -- Chinese President Xi Jinping said Tuesday that China's battle against COVID-19 has demonstrated the power of core socialist values and fine traditional Chinese culture, which provides great motivation and helps build consensus as well as pool resources.
